Posts.Content: Oct 16, 2008 07:55AM musicmom3 wrote: Marietjie, My sister and brother-inlaw are purchasing a hemlock which they will plant when their two sons come home for Thanksgiving.  Their plan is to spread some of the ashes of their daughter in with the roots when planting the tree.  At Christmas, they will decorate the tree outside the house and forego the indoor tree for this year, and possibly for years to come.  So sorry for your loss. J
